text: Astreopora gracilis is a species of hard coral found in shallow water in the tropical Indian and Pacific Oceans. It is an uncommon species with a wide range and the International Union for Conservation of Nature has assessed its conservation status as being of "least concern". ==References== Category:Acroporidae Category:Cnidarians of the Pacific Ocean Category:Fauna of the Indian Ocean Category:Fauna of the Red Sea Category:Marine fauna of Oceania Category:Corals described in 1896
title: Astreopora gracilis
